segments.text: Hey , did you hear about Jessica's party this weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , but I'm still waiting for my invitation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh really ? She gave me mine earlier today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , she'll probably just give me my invitation later on today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , so are you planning on going ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think so . It sounds like it's going to be a lot of fun .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It really does , I can't wait .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What time does the party start ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , well , how many people has she given invites to so far ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm not sure , but I don't think she's given out that many .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , hopefully she'll give me my invite later on today .
segments.speaker: S2
